mapper.sql: id, cust_id, old_status, new_status, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert:
insert into risk_auth_job_log (cust_id, old_status, new_status, gmt_create, gmt_modified ) values
(#{item.custId}, #{item.oldStatus}, #{item.newStatus}, #{item.gmtCreate}, #{item.gmtModified})

insert into risk_auth_job_log
id,
cust_id,
old_status,
new_status,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{custId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{oldStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{newStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update risk_auth_job_log
cust_id = #{custId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
old_status = #{oldStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
new_status = #{newStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update risk_auth_job_log set cust_id = #{custId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, old_status = #{oldStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_status = #{newStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
